message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would really be valuable to you. I'm asking for $120 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $90 is a bit low for me, I could be persuaded to go down to $110.  What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $90. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
